content: Hello! just wanted to ask, i submitted an issue about a bad error as a bug. I thought bad errors were treated as bugs, however the bug label was taken off, are bad errors no longer treated as bugs or is it only for "incorrect" errors?
We still treat poor diagnostics as issues to be fixed, but I think I think the “C-bug” category is reserved for a narrower scope of items
ah ok, wasnt quite sure whether to put it under bug or not :smiley:
The outside communication is "they're bugs" so that people report them on the bug tracker, but they're not internally classified as C-bug
Not that that would make a big difference
ah ok, thanks for clearing it up, ill use enhancement next time :heart:
Yeah, I changed the label because the diagnostic could be more helpful, but it's not wrong.
